meanings.sent1: Eating a balanced diet is optimum for good health.
meanings.sent2: She always strives to achieve optimum performance in her work.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the optimum spot in the sun to take a nap.
meanings.sent4: His optimum effort in the race earned him a gold medal.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained that studying regularly is the optimum way to succeed.

meanings.definition: The best or most favorable condition or degree
meanings.sent1: The farmer ensured the soil was at its optimum for planting crops.
meanings.sent2: The team worked together to reach their optimum during the competition.
meanings.sent3: The party planner found the optimum balance of decorations for the event.
meanings.sent4: The athlete pushed himself to his optimum during the final sprint.
meanings.sent5: The scientist adjusted the settings to achieve the optimum results in the experiment.
